long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Bucket List Extension is a productivity tool designed to help users create, manage, and achieve their personal goals and aspirations. With this extension, you can easily organize your bucket list, set deadlines, and track your progress. The intuitive interface allows you to add items to your list with a simple click, categorize them for easy sorting, and check them off as you complete them.
